annotations:
We have now the ability to develop for sale the below RORO/PASSENGER FERRY
mv "CORSICA MARINA SECONDA"
mv CORSICA MARINA SECONDA - IMO : 7349039
Built 1974 Germany - Flag Italy - RINA Class
Special Survey due on 30 April 27 - Bottom Dry Condition due on 1 July 25
SOLAS 90 - Stockholm Compliant 3.10 m - 2.50 m pending loading case
LOA 120.78 m  - Beam 19.51 m - Depth 12.35 m
GRT/NRT 12,035/3,703
DWAT/Draft 2.082 MT on 5.70 m as C1 - 1,432 MT on 5.33 m as C2
LWT 5620 MT
Pax : 311 pax as C1 - 1494 pax C2 - 31 cabins / 119 berths - Restaurant/Cafeteria/Bar amenities
Garage : 652 LM  / 38  trucks + 69 cars  or 445  cars
Deck 3 FH 4.35 m (2.40 m when deck 4 in lower pos.) - 15 T per axle load (max 60 T)
Deck 4  FH 1.90 m - 0.8 T per axle load
Deck 5 : FH 4.20 m(1.9 m when deck 6 in lower pos.) -10 T per axle load (max 30 T)
Deck  6: FH 1.90 m - 0.8 T per axle load
Stern/Bow ramp shore to deck 3 - Internal lift deck 3/deck 5 - Car deck deck 4 / deck 6
Main Engines 2 MAK 12M551AK  - Auxiliaries Engines 4 MAK
Speed/Consumption Abt 17 knots on abt 1.65T per hour IFO 40 + abt 5.5 T per day MGO
All above in good faith but without guarantee
Inspectable in West Med upon request
Trading on the Corsica Ferries lines between France and Italy!
Best outright offers invited. Can guide as broker.
Pleased to hear
Best regards
George Kaklamanos
_______________________________________________
DRYBULK S.A.
Address: 80 Kifissias Avenue,
GR  151 25, Amaroussion, Greece
Tel    : +30 210 8023 341
Fax   : +30 210 8023 371
